bio:
I'm a former philosophy student turned app developer (Flutter) turned founder (Cuckoo Coding GmbH).

 I'm running an app dev agency in Hannover and we are focused on Flutter cross-plattform development. I'm mostly doing UX and project management, but I actively code as well. In June 2023 Wiley published my book „Flutter für Dummies“.

 I founded the Google Dev Group Hannover and the Female Techmakers Meetup Hannover. Bringing people together, learning together and supporting diversity in the tech world are important topics for me.
title: CEO & Coder
name: Mira Jago
shortBio: I'm a former philosophy student turned app developer (Flutter) turned founder (Cuckoo Coding GmbH)
